key_channel_insights.line_content: Consistent fare parity with the website across most cases, though coverage gaps exist in non-CN markets.
Over 91% of itineraries are cheaper on MSE, showcasing near-universal savings.
Fares match the website at or above 85%, with slight instances of GDS-higher rates.

conclusion.line_content: This report provides a high-level summary of the price discrepancies observed across different channels.  It is important to note that the data contains many nuances depending on various factors such as market conditions, booking windows, and the competitive landscape. Understanding these subtleties can be critical in optimizing pricing strategies and ensuring competitive positioning.

As part of our 'PriceEye' solution, we are developing an intuitive dashboard designed to help your airline's analysts drill down into this data. This tool will allow you to uncover and focus on critical actionable insights, enabling your team to make data-driven decisions with confidence.

We are here to support you in leveraging these insights to enhance your revenue management and distribution strategies. Please don't hesitate to connect with our team for more information about how PriceEye can assist you in achieving your business objectives.

ota_highlights.line_content: Over 90% of itineraries match the website, reflecting stable alignment with direct fares.
No instances of OTA-lower pricing were observed.
Non-CN markets show up to 69% missing site fares, while CN routes stay under 2%.

ota_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: Under 2% in CN routes but up to 69% for Non-CN, limiting visibility outside China.
Dominant at or above 90%, indicating consistent parity.
Mostly below 8% but reaches 31% in a few Non-CN cases, with a downward trend.

ota_summary_by_region.line_content: Over 90% matching fares; OTA-higher at 8% early, but later data are missing.
Over 88% parity, OTA-higher around 3% remains stable.

ota_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: 91%+ fare parity and minimal missing fares highlight strong consistency.
69% missing fares or 31% OTA-higher, leaving little parity.

ota_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: Parity runs 90–98%, with brief OTA-higher spikes dropping from 8% to near 0%.
91–98% same fares, OTA-higher starts near 7% but trends toward 0%.

mse_highlights.line_content: MSE-lower surpasses 91% for long-haul and nearly 100% for short-haul.
Below 0.2% across routes, indicating almost no parity with the airline site.
No instances of MSE-higher, confirming consistent savings.

mse_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: 7% on long-haul but under 1% on short-haul, showing a coverage gap for some flights.
Remains under 0.2% across all ODs, indicating rare fare parity.
Above 91% of itineraries, reinforcing MSE as a cheaper alternative.

mse_summary_by_region.line_content: Nearly 100% are cheaper on MSE, denoting almost universal discount.
MSE-lower averages 91.7%, with slightly more unavailability.

mse_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: MSE-lower at 99.11%, sustaining near-complete discount coverage.
31.25% MSE-lower, 68.75% not found, illustrating limited coverage abroad.

mse_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: 98.76% cheaper fares and 1.08% unavailability, ensuring strong last-minute value.
98.67% cheaper rates, with low unavailability, preserving MSE advantage.

gds_highlights.line_content: Over 85% SAME across all markets, showing strong alignment with website fares.
GDS-lower fares are nearly zero, indicating no discount below the site's pricing.
Around 7–9% GDS-higher, with a slight downward shift over time.

gds_summary_high_level_comparison.line_content: At 85–92%, a consistent match with minor week-to-week changes.
Up to 9% for some routes, though declining from previous levels.
Under 1% in all categories, insignificant in effect.

gds_summary_by_region.line_content: 84–85% SAME, GDS-higher up to 9.3% but gradually tapering off.

gds_summary_by_point_of_origin.line_content: Up to 100% GDS-higher last week, easing to 69% from prior data.

gds_summary_by_booking_window.line_content: Over 80% SAME, around 7% GDS-higher, no GDS-lower.
SAME surpasses 92%, GDS-higher at 1–7%, GDS-lower under 1%.
